## Star Wars FFG Dice Roller Instructions:
### [Dice Roller](starwars/)
#### Dice Rolling Only:
- Enter the appropriate number of dice for each type, hit roll, get results.

#### Using/Saving Character Info
- Enter character information is the appropriate spot.
- To roll a check, select the appropriate skill and the positive dice pool will automatically populate.
- For combat skills, selecting a weapon will also calculate base damage.
- Clicking "save" will create a unique url encoding all the character information currently provided. The url will be updated in the address bar as well as in the text area below the save button.
  - Using that url will always load the previously provided character information.
  - After loading, specializations and force powers will be links to pdfs.

---

- [star wars](starwars/)
  - [kerrex ](https://jonalf.github.io/rpgdiceroller/starwars/#)
  - [test save - hosted](https://jonalf.github.io/rpgdiceroller/starwars/#)
  - [test save - local](http://[::1]:8000/starwars/#)
  - [birdman save - lodcal](http://[::1]:8000/starwars/#)
- [orb](orb/)
  - [last milton save](https://jonalf.github.io/rpgdiceroller/orb/#)
